data.meta_description: See the lineup of concerts at venues in and around Baltimore on the 100.7 The Bay Concert Calendar.

G. OUTREACH ACTIVITIES PERFORMED DURING THE REPORTING PERIOD

MAY 22, 2022—MAY 21, 2023

Initiative: Internship Program – Ongoing

Scope of Participation and Location: 6 Students this period from area Colleges and Universities.

WZBA-FM’s Internship Program is open to College students who desire to earn College credits for

experience in Radio Broadcasting with a concentration in Promotions, Programming, Production and Sales.

Station Staff involved: Steve Huber (Program Director), Donna Jean Rumbley (Promotions Director), Joe

Heffron (General Sales Manager), & Steve Borneman (General Manager 2022).

Initiative: Participation in Immaculate Heart of Mary St. Vincents’s Center Abused and Neglected Children Events –

February/April/October/December / Scope of Participation and Location: Immaculate Heart of Mary,

Towson MD, 21286. Worked with school to make holiday cards, table displays and collections for St

Vincent Center Children (Approx 100 kids)

Station Staff involved: Donna Jean Rumbley, Promotions Director

Initiative: Career Day: Loch Raven High School & Towson University.

Station Staff involved: Donna Jean Rumbley, Promotions Director

Initiative: House of Ruth Fundraiser 10/20/22
